dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 3138 IH: Military Recruiter Right to Carry Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Jody B. Hice of Georgia introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To recognize the right of members of the Armed Forces assigned to duty at Armed Forces recruitment offices to carry a personal or service-issue firearm at the office.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Military Recruiter Right to Carry Act of 2015.

section.header: Right of recruiters to carry a firearm at Armed Forces recruitment offices
section.text: Notwithstanding any Department of Defense policy or Federal, State, or local law to the contrary, a member of the Armed Forces assigned to duty at an Armed Forces recruitment office has the right to carry a personal or service-issue firearm at the office.
